name: Spinny In Object Whatever: Matter Madness
name_original: Spinny In Object Whatever: Matter Madness
description:
Update Log:

August 5, 2021 - Prototype Release (v1.0).

July 21, 2022 - Full Remix Release (v2.0).

----------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to "Spinny In Object Whatever: Matter Madness", a game where a fidget spinner named "Spinny" decides to discover a roleplay game recommended by one of his friends! And yes, he's "totally having a peaceful adventure" with lots of items and galore in each level!

The main objective here is to reach the teleportation portal in each level you discover. But watch out, because some levels require "Whatever Tokens" in order to teleport to the next level! This game includes kaizo levels (optional).

----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Left and right arrow keys (or A and D) to move.

Up arrow key (or W) to jump.

Jump in mid-air, stick to the wall and wall jump.

Hold up arrow key (or hold W key) to propel yourself like a helicopter.

In mid-air, press space to double jump.

In mid-air, press down arrow key (or S) to ground pound.

Press R to reset the current level.

The floating saw blades are nightmares of Spinny's imagination pigment, and somehow, they are hazards for your feet.

The Whatever Tokens are tokens that you can collect for the teleportation portals to make you proceed.

The stone platforms can be useful to land on, but they can somehow break quickly.

The green portals are only to teleport you to another place in the same level.

The moon hand if somehow the final boss before the kaizo levels, and you can only attack it if targeted.

----------------------------------------------------------------

Badge/Achievement List:

Participation Reward - Play a level in this game for the first time.

Making Your Mark - Totally not a "Find The Markers" reference lol.

Just Like Old Times - And I mean literally.

Too Much Free Time - Spend at least 30 minutes in the game while it's still running. Resetting the project will also reset the timer.

Certificate Of Triumph - Clear all the game's kaizo levels on Story Mode.

----------------------------------------------------------------

This game is also available on:

-Scratch (for better quality).

-Turbowarp (for better quality).

-Game Jolt.

-Watch the trailer on YouTube!

This was made for the 5th anniversary of the Roblox object roleplay game "Object Whatever", and this is to honour it!

DISCLAIMER: This is a non-profit fangame based on Object Whatever. And I also have to admit that this is a project remix. This game was made for entertainment purposes only (I mean this fits the SpinThat ChannelAround franchise but I'm putting this in). Object Whatever owned by LollipopProcessing, object shows by their respective owners and Paper Glider owned by 23ScratchMan. This is also made for fair use purposes, thanks for reading!
